name: soundcloud_scrape_playlist
description: Scrape a SoundCloud playlist/set page. Returns playlist name, creator, track count, total duration, like count, and all tracks with details.

steps.code: const titleEl = document.querySelector('.soundTitle__title span, h1 span, [class*="listenDetails"] h1'); const creatorEl = document.querySelector('.soundTitle__username, a[class*="soundTitle__username"]'); const likesEl = document.querySelector('[class*="likeCount"], button[class*="like"] span'); const repostsEl = document.querySelector('[class*="repostCount"], button[class*="repost"] span'); const descEl = document.querySelector('[class*="truncatedAudioInfo__content"], [class*="description"]'); const imgEl = document.querySelector('.image__full, .sc-artwork img'); const dateEl = document.querySelector('time, [class*="relativeTime"]'); const tracks = []; const trackEls = document.querySelectorAll('.trackList__item, [class*="trackList__item"], [class*="compactTrackList"] li'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(trackEls.length, 30); i++) { const el = trackEls[i]; const trackTitleEl = el.querySelector('.trackItem__trackTitle, a[class*="trackTitle"], [class*="title"]'); const trackArtistEl = el.querySelector('.trackItem__username, [class*="username"]'); const durationEl = el.querySelector('[class*="duration"], .playbackTimeline__duration'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/"]'); tracks.push({ title: trackTitleEl ? trackTitleEl.textContent.trim() : '', artist: trackArtistEl ? trackArtistEl.textContent.trim() : '', duration: durationEl ? durationEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '' }); } return { name: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', creator: creatorEl ? creatorEl.textContent.trim() : '', likes: likesEl ? likesEl.textContent.trim() : '', reposts: repostsEl ? repostsEl.textContent.trim() : '', description: descEl ? descEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 500) : '', date: dateEl ? (dateEl.getAttribute('datetime') || dateEl.textContent.trim()) : '', image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '', track_count: tracks.length, tracks: tracks, url: window.location.href }
